29#include <sys/cdefs.h>
30__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: drm_gem_cma_helper.c,v 1.7 2019/03/08 02:53:22 mrg Exp $");
31
32#include <drm/drmP.h>
33#include <drm/drm_gem_cma_helper.h>
34
35#include <uvm/uvm.h>
36
37static struct drm_gem_cma_object *
38drm_gem_cma_create_internal(struct drm_device *ddev, size_t size,
39 struct sg_table *sgt)
40{
41 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj;
42 int error, nsegs;
43
44 obj = kmem_zalloc(sizeof(*obj), KM_SLEEP);
45 obj->dmat = ddev->dmat;
46 obj->dmasize = size;
47
48 if (sgt) {
49 error = -drm_prime_sg_to_bus_dmamem(obj->dmat, obj->dmasegs, 1,
50 &nsegs, sgt);
51 } else {
52 error = bus_dmamem_alloc(obj->dmat, obj->dmasize, PAGE_SIZE, 0,
53 obj->dmasegs, 1, &nsegs, BUS_DMA_WAITOK);
54 }
55 if (error)
56 goto failed;
57 error = bus_dmamem_map(obj->dmat, obj->dmasegs, nsegs,
58 obj->dmasize, &obj->vaddr, BUS_DMA_WAITOK | BUS_DMA_COHERENT);
59 if (error)
60 goto free;
61 error = bus_dmamap_create(obj->dmat, obj->dmasize, 1,
62 obj->dmasize, 0, BUS_DMA_WAITOK, &obj->dmamap);
63 if (error)
64 goto unmap;
65 error = bus_dmamap_load(obj->dmat, obj->dmamap, obj->vaddr,
66 obj->dmasize, NULL, BUS_DMA_WAITOK);
67 if (error)
68 goto destroy;
69
70 if (!sgt)
71 memset(obj->vaddr, 0, obj->dmasize);
72
73 drm_gem_private_object_init(ddev, &obj->base, size);
74
75 return obj;
76
77destroy:
78 bus_dmamap_destroy(obj->dmat, obj->dmamap);
79unmap:
80 bus_dmamem_unmap(obj->dmat, obj->vaddr, obj->dmasize);
81free:
82 bus_dmamem_free(obj->dmat, obj->dmasegs, nsegs);
83failed:
84 kmem_free(obj, sizeof(*obj));
85
86 return NULL;
87}
88
89struct drm_gem_cma_object *
90drm_gem_cma_create(struct drm_device *ddev, size_t size)
91{
92
93 return drm_gem_cma_create_internal(ddev, size, NULL);
94}
95
96static void
97drm_gem_cma_obj_free(struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj)
98{
99
100 bus_dmamap_unload(obj->dmat, obj->dmamap);
101 bus_dmamap_destroy(obj->dmat, obj->dmamap);
102 bus_dmamem_unmap(obj->dmat, obj->vaddr, obj->dmasize);
103 if (obj->sgt)
104 drm_prime_sg_free(obj->sgt);
105 else
106 bus_dmamem_free(obj->dmat, obj->dmasegs, 1);
107 kmem_free(obj, sizeof(*obj));
108}
109
110void
111drm_gem_cma_free_object(struct drm_gem_object *gem_obj)
112{
113 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj = to_drm_gem_cma_obj(gem_obj);
114
115 drm_gem_free_mmap_offset(gem_obj);
116 drm_gem_object_release(gem_obj);
117 drm_gem_cma_obj_free(obj);
118}
119
120int
121drm_gem_cma_dumb_create(struct drm_file *file_priv, struct drm_device *ddev,
122 struct drm_mode_create_dumb *args)
123{
124 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj;
125 uint32_t handle;
126 int error;
127
128 args->pitch = args->width * ((args->bpp + 7) / 8);
129 args->size = args->pitch * args->height;
130 args->size = roundup(args->size, PAGE_SIZE);
131 args->handle = 0;
132
133 obj = drm_gem_cma_create(ddev, args->size);
134 if (obj == NULL)
135 return -ENOMEM;
136
137 error = drm_gem_handle_create(file_priv, &obj->base, &handle);
138 drm_gem_object_unreference_unlocked(&obj->base);
139 if (error) {
140 drm_gem_cma_obj_free(obj);
141 return error;
142 }
143
144 args->handle = handle;
145
146 return 0;
147}
148
149int
150drm_gem_cma_dumb_map_offset(struct drm_file *file_priv, struct drm_device *ddev,
151 uint32_t handle, uint64_t *offset)
152{
153 struct drm_gem_object *gem_obj;
154 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj;
155 int error;
156
157 gem_obj = drm_gem_object_lookup(ddev, file_priv, handle);
158 if (gem_obj == NULL)
159 return -ENOENT;
160
161 obj = to_drm_gem_cma_obj(gem_obj);
162
163 if (drm_vma_node_has_offset(&obj->base.vma_node) == 0) {
164 error = drm_gem_create_mmap_offset(&obj->base);
165 if (error)
166 goto done;
167 } else {
168 error = 0;
169 }
170
171 *offset = drm_vma_node_offset_addr(&obj->base.vma_node);
172
173done:
174 drm_gem_object_unreference_unlocked(&obj->base);
175
176 return error;
177}
178
179static int
180drm_gem_cma_fault(struct uvm_faultinfo *ufi, vaddr_t vaddr,
181 struct vm_page **pps, int npages, int centeridx, vm_prot_t access_type,
182 int flags)
183{
184 struct vm_map_entry *entry = ufi->entry;
185 struct uvm_object *uobj = entry->object.uvm_obj;
186 struct drm_gem_object *gem_obj =
187 container_of(uobj, struct drm_gem_object, gemo_uvmobj);
188 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj = to_drm_gem_cma_obj(gem_obj);
189 off_t curr_offset;
190 vaddr_t curr_va;
191 paddr_t paddr, mdpgno;
192 u_int mmapflags;
193 int lcv, retval;
194 vm_prot_t mapprot;
195
196 if (UVM_ET_ISCOPYONWRITE(entry))
197 return EIO;
198
199 curr_offset = entry->offset + (vaddr - entry->start);
200 curr_va = vaddr;
201
202 retval = 0;
203 for (lcv = 0; lcv < npages; lcv++, curr_offset += PAGE_SIZE,
204 curr_va += PAGE_SIZE) {
205 if ((flags & PGO_ALLPAGES) == 0 && lcv != centeridx)
206 continue;
207 if (pps[lcv] == PGO_DONTCARE)
208 continue;
209
210 mdpgno = bus_dmamem_mmap(obj->dmat, obj->dmasegs, 1,
211 curr_offset, access_type, BUS_DMA_PREFETCHABLE);
212 if (mdpgno == -1) {
213 retval = EIO;
214 break;
215 }
216 paddr = pmap_phys_address(mdpgno);
217 mmapflags = pmap_mmap_flags(mdpgno);
218 mapprot = ufi->entry->protection;
219
220 if (pmap_enter(ufi->orig_map->pmap, curr_va, paddr, mapprot,
221 PMAP_CANFAIL | mapprot | mmapflags) != 0) {
222 pmap_update(ufi->orig_map->pmap);
223 uvmfault_unlockall(ufi, ufi->entry->aref.ar_amap, uobj);
224 uvm_wait("drm_gem_cma_fault");
225 return ERESTART;
226 }
227 }
228
229 pmap_update(ufi->orig_map->pmap);
230 uvmfault_unlockall(ufi, ufi->entry->aref.ar_amap, uobj);
231
232 return retval;
233}
234
235const struct uvm_pagerops drm_gem_cma_uvm_ops = {
236 .pgo_reference = drm_gem_pager_reference,
237 .pgo_detach = drm_gem_pager_detach,
238 .pgo_fault = drm_gem_cma_fault,
239};
240
241struct sg_table *
242drm_gem_cma_prime_get_sg_table(struct drm_gem_object *gem_obj)
243{
244 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj = to_drm_gem_cma_obj(gem_obj);
245
246 return drm_prime_bus_dmamem_to_sg(obj->dmat, obj->dmasegs, 1);
247}
248
249struct drm_gem_object *
250drm_gem_cma_prime_import_sg_table(struct drm_device *ddev,
251 struct dma_buf_attachment *attach, struct sg_table *sgt)
252{
253 size_t size = drm_prime_sg_size(sgt);
254 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj;
255
256 obj = drm_gem_cma_create_internal(ddev, size, sgt);
257 if (obj == NULL)
258 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
259
260 return &obj->base;
261}
262
263void *
264drm_gem_cma_prime_vmap(struct drm_gem_object *gem_obj)
265{
266 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj = to_drm_gem_cma_obj(gem_obj);
267
268 return obj->vaddr;
269}
270
271void
272drm_gem_cma_prime_vunmap(struct drm_gem_object *gem_obj, void *vaddr)
273{
274 struct drm_gem_cma_object *obj __diagused =
275 to_drm_gem_cma_obj(gem_obj);
276
277 KASSERT(vaddr == obj->vaddr);
278}
